OOC: Can you just clarify the situation in the Nemesis? I didn't 
quite understand...

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Polar Claw <cycodrone@y...> wrote:
> Shadowcaster suddenly found himself in a plane filled
> with light, suddenly plucked from the nirvana of the
> Matrix. All around him was blingind white- the source
> of it appeared to be a being the size of the legendary
> chaos bringer himself. However, this being radiated
> something intense, but at the same time, this
> intensity seemed to be founded on infinite good. 
> 
> It took Shaodwcaster a mintue to realise who he was in
> the presense of and when he did, he could hardly
> believe it. There, in front of him, was Primus.
> 
> Primus then began to speak, but in a surprisingly soft
> tone and volume for one his size.  "Be not afraid my
> chosen one, for I have summoned you here for a purpose
> which is of critical importance for the future of the
> universe.  I know for eons deep down what you have
> wondered - how a Decepticon would become one of the
> greatest protectors of the Autobots in Cybertronian
> history.  The Answer is that it was by my hand. I was
> the one who altered your programing, you were chosen
> by my own intervention to be a guardian for those of
> my children who required protection."
> 
> Shadowcaster for the first time in his existence was
> speechless. How could it have been that he was chosen?
> Why him? He knew that he was the most advanced of the
> 1st generation of Transformers to be created but aside
> from his design, why him?
> 
> Primus continued "I know what you're thinking- why me?
> The fact is that aside from your design, your spark
> was that of a hero, a being destined to save, to be
> great. That fusion made you my choice as guardian for
> my Autobot children. And watch over them well you did-
> the war would not have turned out as it did were it
> not for your intervention.  I know that in the Beast
> Wars, you lost much that was close to you, but I am
> glad that you were able to join with the matrix, see
> what you were meant for, to be reniewed for the
> purpose you were meant for. Now though I have a new
> purpose- one far more perilous and crucial than any I
> have given you before.  I am sending you back in time-
> Unicron has contacted himself in the past and informed
> himself of his future defeat, and now tries to alter
> history.  I cannot intervene, however I send you back
> to fight for me against him.  I will give you your
> optimised maximal body, along with all the data it
> contained, as well as the ability to sense the matrix
> in any era you are in, along with its present location
> and its location in the time you are travelling to. It
> is on your shoulders that the fate of every
> cybertronian and possibly the universe rests. Go now,
> and protect all my children- Autobot, Maximal,
> Decepticon, Tripredacus and Predacon alike. Bring them
> peace, unite them.  Remeber always, you are my hands,
> my eyes, my tongue, my ears.... Remember always I
> believe in you....."
> ------------------------------------------------------
> 
> Megatron cackled manaiacally ordering Dinobot to open
> fire as the Nemesis closed in on the volcano which
> would later be named Mount Saint Hillary.
> 
> Optimus was in disbelief at what he saw "By the
> matrix, if Megatron succeeds here, we'll all be
> destroyed.  Shadimus, you're in command! Optimus-"
> Optimus was interrupted by Shadimus' hand clasped
> firmly on his shoulder.
> 
> He looked into Primal's eyes, with the look of a
> martyr about to sacrifice himself unwillingly, but at
> the same time knowing there was no other way.
> 
> "No! Your place is with those undser your command...
> This is no longer about revenge or vindication.... I
> know what must be done. Optimus, take care you those I
> have sworn to watch over..... Optimus Prime would be
> proud to know his name had gone to a more than worthy
> successor.?"
> 
> Optimus tried desperately to persuade him otherwise
> "Wait, you don't have to do this, there has to be
> another way. I'm not in the mood to lose any more
> friends today!"
> 
> "Please don't make this harder than it already is. My
> duty is to protect the Autobots and their decendants.
> It has been an honour serving with you, but I cannot
> shirk my duty.... Til all... are one!"
> 
> Before Optimus could react, Shadimus broke away from
> him, and transformed into his air attack mode, guns
> blazing at the predacon ship, destroying turret after
> turret.
> 
> "Shadimus... NOOOO!" Primal cried out, but he knew it
> was too late. The other Maximals looked on is respect
> but in disbelief, as if watching someone close to them
> fall out of their grasp when hanging perilously over a
> cliff. 
> 
> Megatron was less than impressed "Playtimes over
> pussycat... Yess! OPEN FIRE, ALL CANNONS!" The turrets
> started heavily ripping into his armour, faster than
> Shdimus could fire back. Knowing the specs of the
> Nemesis from millions of years ago, Shadimus knew what
> he had to do. "Computer, disengage all safety
> protocols, program omega-1." 
> 
> "Acknowledged..." reluctantly came the voice of his
> internal computer.
> 
> With that he adjusted his flight path into a collision
> course directly at the bridge of the behemoth.
> 
> The cannonse kept ripping him to shreds, the pain
> becoming intense, however Shadimus refused to waver
> "Til.... all....... are..... one!"
> With that the ripped a gaping hole in the hull of the
> Nemesis, with Shadimus seemilngy being atomised in the
> process.
> 
> OOC: It's upto whoever ius playing the characters that
> were in Nemesis parts 1 and 2 as to their
> memories/feelings for that day. Especially critical
> with Rattrap who's Shadowcaster's son.
> 
> BIC: Unknown to all parties, at that instant, several
> microscopic transwarp portals opened up absorbing
> piece after piece after piece of Shadimus' broken
> body.
> ------------------------------------------------------
> 
> Not far from the Maximal base, a submerged blank
> protoform begins to glow bright white, its form
> becoming unrecognisable, as several transwarp portals
> open up around the now seemingly formless protoform,
> the parts these portals have ferried merging with the
> protoform, as it begins to alter it's form, like clay
> moulded with unseen hands, over the course of a
> minute, altering form until with an ethereal glow
> surrounding him, Shadowcaster awakens.
> OOC: these protals would be noticable by Maximal
> scanners.
> 
> BIC:Not wasting any time, he quickly scans the area
> for the Maximal Base, transforms into his air attack
> mode, then flys there at top speed, landing in front
> of the base. Once landed and transformed into robot
> mode, he opens up a channel, a wry smile on his face.
> 
> "Maximal Base this is Shadowcaster. Let me just say
> that, while the Matrix was nice, it's great to be back
> among the living."
> 
> 
>
